event.title: the construction of a mill in 1829

data.event: Samuel Smith built the first home in Chester, established a ferry system, and began the construction of a mill in 1829.

The first business in Chester was a general store that opened in 1830 along with a castor oil press established by R. B. Servant, who furnished farmers with seed and growing methods to later buy the beans they produced for oil extraction.
The first wedding in the town of Chester was held on February 4, 1834.
